extendedInfo.description: Baviux are small blue creatures that were removed from their planet and taken as slaves. Now, with your help, they can go back to home...To play you must use the two buttons to create "air flows", and you can rotate your phone to change gravity!!The gameplay reminds the 80's "water games".Features: - 7 worlds and 70 levels. And more coming soon! - Use the accelerometer! - Multitouch support - Excellent Physics - Cute graphics! - Low graphics option for old devices - Easy to learn - Fun and addictive - "Move to SD" option available - Global high scores! (powered by Scoreloop)Coming soon: - New creatures - New levels - And more!"READ_PHONE_STATE" permission is required only for scoreloopPLEASE e-mail me if this game doesn't run on your device, or encounter an error. Thanks :)Powered by Andengine

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: It\'s like one of those water-filled games from my childhood but with electronic bells and whistles. Nice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet! Now I don\'t have to go to the dentist
reviews.comment: Grav not working so well; it really only kicks in on the way up (T959), which is, of course, not when I want to correct trajectory (nor realistic). Very cute/fam friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its just the Stolux I dont like                      Im on 4 2.PLEASE REPLACE THE STOLUX WITH ANOTHER CREATURE!!!!

reviews.title: Alright I guess...
reviews.comment: Just like the water jet games in the 80\'s it will keep you busy for about 5 minutes... it\'s probably fun on a smaller device but, flailing a Tab about makes you look a bit silly. overall the game is very good, just no re playability and the Tab thing i said earlier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its just a digital version of the old water jet games, and just as boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game is hard! But fun! Reminds me of that water toy and u try to get the loops on the rocket using the squirter!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun game to play. Need a way to save the game without starting over again. GALAXY TAB!

reviews.comment: Fun & addicting, works great on my original droid running pe v5 (gingerbread). @john it auto saves, just goto \"select level\"

reviews.comment: Pink quicksand blocks are annoying, sometimes easier to solve by not using air jet at all and just tilt phone. Why is there a time limit? Fun game!
